video_prompt: Dynamic shift from beach waves lapping wet sand to rippling liquid inside a glass. Contents effervesce, palm fronds sway, tiny birds fly in and out. Submerged dolphin glides with rising bubbles. Liquids subtly transition and swirl.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A transparent glass containing a miniature, layered tropical beach scene. The top half is an effervescent orange sunset with palm trees on a small island, yellow flowers, two white sailboats on a blue ocean, and flying seagulls. An orange slice and bubbles are visible. The bottom half transitions to a deep blue ocean with a playful, dark blue and white dolphin and silver bubbles. The glass sits on wet beach sand at sunset, reflecting warm golden and orange hues, with gentle waves in the background. Tranquil and vibrant.
refined_video_prompt: Waves lap wet sand, dynamically morphing into liquid rippling inside a glass. Contents effervesce. Palm fronds sway, tiny birds darting in and out. A dolphin glides with rising bubbles. Liquids continually transition and swirl.
